Package org.gservlet

Contains a number of classes and interfaces to create servlets, filters, listeners with the Groovy language.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FileListener
    Interface for receiving notification events about files changes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractContextAttributeListener
    Abstract class for receiving notification events about ServletContext attribute changes.
    AbstractContextListener
    Abstract class for receiving notification events about ServletContext lifecycle changes.
    AbstractFilter
    Abstract class to perform filtering tasks on either the request to a resource (a servlet or static content), or on the response from a resource, or both.
    AbstractListener
    Abstract base class inherited by all the listeners classes.
    AbstractRequestAttributeListener
    Abstract class for receiving notification events about ServletRequest attribute changes.
    AbstractRequestListener
    Abstract class for receiving notification events about requests coming into and going out of scope of a web application.
    AbstractServlet
    Abstract class to create a servlet that can respond to HTTP requests
    AbstractSessionActivationListener
    Abstract class for receiving notification events about sessions being activated and passivated.
    AbstractSessionAttributeListener
    Abstract class for receiving notification events about HttpSession attribute changes.
    AbstractSessionBindingListener
    Abstract class for receiving notification events when an object is bound to or unbound from a session.
    AbstractSessionIdListener
    Abstract class for receiving notification events about HttpSession id changes.
    AbstractSessionListener
    Abstract class for receiving notification events about sessions lifecycle changes.
    Constants
    Final class that defines the constants used to control the behavior of the application.
    ContainerInitializer
    The ContainerInitializer class manages the registration and the reloading of a servlet, filter or listener into the web container.
    ContextWrapper
    A wrapper class around the ServletContext class.
    DatabaseManager
    The DatabaseManager handles the creation and the configuration of the data source.
    DefaultRequestFilter
    The DefaultRequestFilter handles the request forwarding to a newly created servlet.
    DefaultRequestListener
    The DefaultRequestListener handles the creation and the closing of a database connection.
    DynamicInvocationHandler
    An InvocationHandler implementation class that must be associated with a proxy instance.
    FileAdapter
    An abstract adapter class for receiving file events.
    FileEvent
    Events of this kind indicate change events for a file.
    FileWatcher
    The FileWatcher class checks a folder for file changes and notifies the listeners accordingly.
    RequestContext
    Context holder for request-specific state.
    RequestWrapper
    A wrapper class around the HttpServletRequest class.
    ScriptManager
    An specific class to load Groovy scripts.
    SessionWrapper
    A wrapper class around the HttpSession class.
    StartupListener
    Bootstraps the application and the starts the registration of the servlets, filters, listeners into the web container.

Package org.gservlet Description

Contains a number of classes and interfaces to create servlets, filters, listeners with the Groovy language.
Author:
Mamadou Lamine Ba
See Also:
javax.servlet
